effects.display_string: Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to hit a Jackpot! that summons a Storm Elemental for 7.2 sec. Casting Ascendance always hits a Jackpot!
Set: When you summon or extend your Storm Elemental, your Lightning Bolt, Chain Lightning, Tempest, and Lava Burst deal 30% increased damage for 8 sec.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Equip: Your spells and abilities have a high chance to lase your target for Precision Blasting, calling in Mister Lock-N-Stalk to deal 839,971 Physical damage to your target.
Use: Recalibrate for Mass Destruction. (20 Sec Cooldown)

Use: Flip to the next section.

 (1 Sec Cooldown)
Equip: Every 5 sec spent in combat sacrifices 4,904 of your health to gain 1,077 Intellect. This effect can stack up to 3 times and lasts until combat ends.
Equip: When a nearby enemy or devout ally falls, you siphon a portion of their soul to gain 376 Intellect for 10 min.
